title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly describe the function being carried out by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) in the scenario. The response must include a reference to the scenario.

For Task B, the response must correctly explain how an interest group can affect the process described in part A. The response must include a reference to the policy issue or content in the scenario.

For Task C, the response must explain how Congress could respond to this decision if it opposes the new rule.
descriptions:
The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.

The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a response to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question. [NOTE: Task B is not included in the list below, as the point for this task cannot be earned independently of the point for Task A.]
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a response to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a response to earn a point for B they must first earn the A point.
